name: Context Access Test
description: Test how context variables are accessed in workflows

inputs.code:
import json

# Test different ways of accessing the search results
print('=== CONTEXT ACCESS DEBUG ===')
print(f'Type of test_search: {type({{test_search}})}')
print(f'Keys in test_search: {list({{test_search}}.keys()) if isinstance({{test_search}}, dict) else "Not a dict"}')
print(f'Success: {{test_search.success}}')
print(f'Results type: {type({{test_search.results}})}')
print(f'Results count: {len({{test_search.results}})}')
print(f'Total results: {{test_search.total_results}}')
print(f'Response time: {{test_search.response_time}}')

# Test if we can access individual results
if {{test_search.results}}:
    print(f'First result type: {type({{test_search.results}}[0])}')
    print(f'First result keys: {list({{test_search.results}}[0].keys()) if isinstance({{test_search.results}}[0], dict) else "Not a dict"}')
    print(f'First result title: {{test_search.results}}[0].get("title", "No title")}')
else:
    print('No results found')
